patch.summary: New - Update status of Apps as according to the user's input.
patch.description: Update status of the applications given in the input list with the status (e.g. UserRejected, Managed, Installing) provided by user.

parameters.name: udid
parameters.description: udid of the device for which the action needs to be performed.(Required)

parameters.name: devicetype
parameters.description: Type of the device whose udid is being passed. e.g. Apple , Android , WindowsPhone8, WinRT(Required)

parameters.name: AppListForStatusUpdate
parameters.description: This represents the list of Application Ids and type of application.(Required)

422.description: 1. {1012: The Status field is required}2. {1012: The AppType field is required}3. {7302: Device Not Found Or Not Enrolled}4. {7017: Updating Apps sample with given status failed}

get.summary:
GetAllAssignedApps(..) returns all the apps that are assiged to a device.
This mimics app catalog and represnts app catalog as an API.
Added for GB integration.

parameters.name: udid
parameters.description: Device UDID which has to be encrypted.

post.summary:
InstallApp(..) API will enable app install. It mimics the app catalog flow. Added for Greenbox integration.
This method supports install for different app types. It forwards requests to respective app type adapters.
It also covers the EULA and Compliance flows for app install.

get.summary: Gets application details.

This API will return the enrollment URL. If GB is accessed from an unmanaged device and AW is configured, we redirect the user
to the enrollment URL to be able to view and install apps from AW after enrolling.

post.summary: API to update the EULA acceptance from GB. When a user is prompted with an EULA and accepts it, this API is called to udpate the EULA acceptance.

get.summary: Retrieves the application management status, i.e. the application bundle id passed is managedby AirWatch or not.
Searches in App stores for the applications with the specified search string and returns the details

Retrieves the details of the applications from the Windows App Store based on the search request.
Gets application details.

GetAllAssignedApps(..) returns all the apps that are assiged to a device.
This mimics app catalog and represnts app catalog as an API.
Added for GB integration.

parameters.name: udid
parameters.description: Device UDID which has to be encrypted.

get.summary:
Search and retrieve removal logs for internal applications.
If the number of remove application commands queued in a set time interval is exceeded the commands are put in locked state
The API method returns the details of the commands that are put in locked state
The records returned take into consideration the filter criteria recieved in request query

put.summary:
Updates the action taken on the threshold.
Either unlock/clear the threshold. 
On unlock the commands are sent to the device
On clear the commands are purged from the queue.

parameters.name: moduleType
parameters.description: Module type of file being uploaded. Example: General, Application, Book etc., Default: General

400.description: Bad Request 1.{7019: File is not attached}2.{400: Invalid blob type provided}3.{400: Invalid Module type. Supported Values : General, Application, Content, TagContent, ProductProvisioning, Book}

FileName.description: Gets or sets FileName {Will be set in the content-disposition header}

IRequestQuery.description:
Interface for IAwRequestQuery
This will hold all the required data for a request. Will be filled from ModelBinder

QueryParams.description: Gets or sets Query Parameters. For e.g. any query string parameters will be extracted to key,value pair and stored here.

TenantContext.description: Gets or sets IAwTenantContext. Will hold the tenant details, which will be filled as part of the tenant validation handler

RequestMethod.description: Gets or sets RequestMethod. Will be used to write custom rules

AllowedUriQueryChars.description: Gets or sets allowed Characters in Query String.

ITenantContext.description: Contract for TenantContext. Will be exposed from RequestQuery and will be injected to every controller actions and Business method

TenantCode.description: Gets or sets TenantCode. Uniquely identify the tenant for the request

OrganizationgroupId.description: Gets or sets Organization Group ID

AppV1ListModel.description: List of apps rejected by user

appModelList.description: List of ApplicationId, AppType and Managed Application status.

AppV1Model.description: AppId and AppType of app rejected by user

appType.description: Type of the application e.g. Internal or Public etc

status.description: status to which the apps sample should be update to. e.g. UserRejected, Managed, Installing etc

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

awCatalogItems.description: List of application details for the device

externalStoreAppId.description:
The store Id of the app on the public app store (like google play, itunes)
Only applicable for public apps

icon.description: The url for the icon of the item

version.description: If versioned what version is this item

scheme.description: Scheme of the application used to launch the app in iOS

groups.description:
The groups responding to special attributes with this item
Examples include "featured", "required", "updates", etc.

categories.description: All of the categories for a given item

activationUrl.description: The url that will allow an app to be opened and is passed attributes in the url

description.description:
For certain item types, like Products, we do not currently
have an api to load the description seperately from the lite items load.
So for ONLY those situations, we will allow the description to be passed here

supervisedOrEnterpriseApp.description: Load if the device is an iOS supervised device or if its and Android Enterprise App

eulaId.description: EULA ID associated with the application

iconId.description:
Blob Id of the Icon.
{AW.Mam.Api.Model.ApplicationCatalogInfoModel.Icon} is generated using the IconId

rating.description: The averaged rating for the item

isPaid.description: Is the app a paid application

currency.description: The Currency set for the cost of this application. ex: "USD"

isBeta.description: Flag to indicate if the admin specified as this being the beta version

usesSDK.description: Flag to indicate the app uses the AW SDK

size.description: The size of the downloadable file for this item

installMessageType.description: The install prompt message that needs to shown when user clicks install for an app

UserGroupAssignmentModel.description: The user/ user group assignment model for app.

Users.description: Gets or sets the user list.

UserGroups.description: Gets or sets the user group list.

UserAssignmentModel.description: The user assignment model for app.

Id.description: Gets or sets the user external id.

Name.description: Gets or sets the user name.

GroupAssignmentModel.description: The user group assignment model for app.

Id.description: Gets or sets the user group external id.

Name.description: Gets or sets the user group name.

DataBackupBlocked.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether prevent backup.

ContactSyncBlocked.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether contact sync blocked.

PrintBlocked.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether print blocked.

PinCharacterSet.description: Gets or sets the pin character set.

AllowAppsToTransferDataToOtherApps.description: Gets or sets the allow app to transfer data to other apps.

AllowAppsToReceiveDataFromOtherApps.description: Gets or sets the allow app to receive data from other apps.

PreventSaveAs.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether prevent save as.

RestrictCutCopyPasteWithOtherApps.description: Gets or sets the restrict cut copy and paste with other apps.

RestrictWebContentToDisplayInManagedBrow.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether restrict web content to display in managed browser.

EncryptAppDataForIoS.description: Gets or sets the encrypt app data.

EncryptAppDataForAndroid.description: Gets or sets the encrypt app data.

screenCaptureBlocked.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether block screen capture and android assistant.

AllowedDataStorageLocations.description: Gets or sets the allowed data storage locations.

RequirePinAccess.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether require pin access.

MaximumPinRetries.description: Gets or sets the maximum pin retries.

AllowSimplePin.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether allow simple pin.

MinimumPinLength.description: Gets or sets the minimum pin length.

AllowFingerprintInsteadOfPin.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether allow fingerprint instead of pin.

RequireCorporateCredentialsForAccess.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether require corporate credentials for access.

BlockManagedAppsFromRunningOnJailBrokenO.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether block managed apps.

TimeOut.description: Gets or sets the timeout to recheck access requirements.

GracePeriod.description: Gets or sets the offline grace period to recheck access requirements.

OfflineIntervalBeforeAppDataIsWiped.description: Gets or sets the offline interval before app data is wiped.

Office365MamAndroidApplicationPolicyId.description: Gets or sets the office 365 mam android application policy id.

Office365MamIosApplicationPolicyId.description: Gets or sets the office 365 mam ios application policy id.

Office365MamApplicationPolicyTimestamp.description: Gets or sets the office 365 mam application policy timestamp.

UserGroups.description: Gets or sets the user groups.

AndroidApplications.description: Gets or sets the android applications.

IosApplications.description: Gets or sets the ios applications.

AndroidPolicyGuid.description: Gets or sets the android policy guid.

IosPolicyGuid.description: Gets or sets the ios policy guid.

UserName.description: Gets or sets the user name.

AzureUserGroups.description: Gets or sets the azure user groups.

DisplayName.description: Gets or sets the display name.

AppRemovalProtectionModel.description: This entity represents core properties of App Removal Protection details.

CreatedOn.description: Gets or sets date on which the record was created

ModifiedOn.description: Gets or sets date on which the record was modified

Identifier.description: Gets or sets BundleId of the app for which command was queued

Source.description: Gets or sets the source of command.

ThresholdStatus.description: Gets or sets the value of the ThresholdStatus in threshold table.

ThresholdId.description: Gets or sets the ThresholdId for which command is queued.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID
Gets or sets current objects UUID

AppRemovalProtectionLogSearchResultModel.description: App Removal Protections Logs search result

ResultSet.description: Gets or sets List of device details resulted in the search operation

AdditionalInfo.description: Gets or sets Hypermedia content for the result

UpdateAppRemovalProtectionModel.description: Model for updating the app removal protection logs

ThresholdId.description: Gets or sets List of Threshold Id

NewThresholdStatus.description: Gets or sets the value of the NewThresholdStatus in Threshold table.

BookmarkNameHash.description: Gets or sets Bookmark name hash

ControllerModel.description: Model to define the Controller and its components like Description, custom attributes and end points

endpointsErrorCount.description: Gets or sets the total number of endpoint errors for a particular controller

modified.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the controller contains a new endpoint

isinternal.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the controller is interal

totalNewEndpoints.description: Gets or sets the total number of new endpoints for a particular controller

isnew.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether it is a new endpoint

isinternal.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether it is an internal endpoint

obsolete.description: Gets or sets obsolete value if present

validationErrorCount.description: Gets or sets validation error count

version.description: Gets or sets version of endpoint if it exists

EndPointDetailsModel.description: Class to define the model for the endpoint

resourceDescription.description: Gets or sets the {AW.WebApi.Common.Documentation.ModelDescriptions.ModelDescription} that describes the resource.

sampleRequests.description: Gets or sets the sample requests associated with the API.

sampleResponses.description: Gets or sets  sample responses associated with the API.

isValid.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether IsValid

EndpointIndexId.description: Gets or sets the endpoint index ID

EndpointIndexDetail.description: gets or sets the endpoint index details

OperationId.description: Gets or sets the operation ID.

Name.description: Gets or sets the model name.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

Name.description: Gets or sets the category name.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

SmartGroupId.description: Gets or sets the smart group id.

SmartGroupName.description: Gets or sets the smart group name.

PushMode.description: Gets or sets the Push Mode for the Application.

EffectiveDate.description: Gets or sets the EffectiveDate Date for  the Application.

RemoveOnUnEnroll.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the appslication should be removed on unenrollment.

ApplicationBackup.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether application backup is enabled.

AutoUpdateDevicesWithPreviousVersion.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the newest version of the app should be pushed to devices that have already downloaded the app.

PerAppVpn.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Per App VPN flag for iOS devices is enabled.

VpnProfileId.description: Gets or sets the VPN Profile ID associated with the application.

Rank.description: Gets or sets the Application Rank.

AppConfig.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether custom application configuration keys and values should be sent to the device.

AppConfigs.description: Gets or sets the app configs.

ApplicationTransformIds.description: Application Transforms Ids attached to the application

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

CommandLineArguments.description: Command-line options to be used when calling MSIEXEC.exe.

InstallTimeoutInMinutes.description:
Amount of time, in minutes that the installation process can run before the installer 
considers the installation may have failed and no longer monitors the installation operation.Range 0-60

RetryCount.description: The number of times the download and installation operation will be retried before the installation will be marked as failed. With a limit of 10' attempts.

RetryIntervalInMinutes.description: Amount of time, in minutes between retry operations. Range 0-10

Key.description: Gets or sets the configuration key.

Value.description: Gets or sets the configuration value.

Type.description: Gets or sets the configuration value type.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

WhenToInstallApiModel.description: A model class for when to install options.

DiskSpaceRequiredInKb.description: The disk space required for installation of the package in KB.

DevicePowerRequired.description: The device power required for installation of the package. Valid range 0 - 100.

RamRequiredInMb.description: The RAM required for the installation of the page in MB.

HowToInstallApiModel.description: A model class for how to install options.

InstallContext.description: Install context (Supported values:  Device, User) where the package has to be installed.

InstallCommand.description: Gets or sets the install command to install a package using the command line ex: "/quiet".

AdminPrivileges.description: Value indicating whether admin privileges are needed for the installation of a package.

DeviceRestart.description: The device restart option. Supported values: DoNotRestart, ForceRestart, RestartIfNeeded

RetryCount.description: The number of times package installation operation will be retried.  Valid range 0 - 10

RetryIntervalInMinutes.description: The amount of time in minutes between retry operations.  Valid range 0 - 10

InstallTimeoutInMinutes.description: The amount of time in minutes that the installation process can run before the installer considers the installation may have failed.  Valid range 0 - 60

VersionCondition.description: Version condition. Supported values: Any, EqualTo, GreaterThan, LessThan.

MajorVersion.description: The major version of the application.

MinorVersion.description: The minor version of the application.

RevisionNumber.description: The fix version of the application.

ModifiedOn.description: The date on which the application was last modified.

RegistryCriteriaApiModel.description: A model class for the registry criteria.

Path.description: The path of the key in the registry.

KeyName.description: The name of new key to be created in the registry.

KeyType.description: The type of key to be created in the registry. Supported values : String, Binary, DWord, QWord, MultiString, ExpandableString

KeyValue.description: The value of the key to be created in the registry.

DeploymentByCriteriaApiModel.description: A model class for the application deployment.

CriteriaType.description: Criteria type. Supported values: AppExists, AppDoesNotExist, FileExists, FileDoesNotExist, RegistryExists, RegistryDoesNotExist

LogicalCondition.description: Logical condition. Supported values : End, And, Or.

CustomScriptApiModel.description: Model class for the application uninstall process section applicable for .exe/.msi application(s).

CustomScriptType.description: The custom script type (Supported values: Input, Upload).

UninstallScriptBlobId.description:
Gets or sets the ID value of the uninstall script file uploaded on the console.
Supported file types : js,jse,ps1,ps1xml,psc1,psd1,psm1,pssc,cdxml,vbs,vbe,wsf,wsc

UseCustomScript.description: Value indicating whether custom script is used or not.

CustomScriptFileBlodId.description:
The BlobId of the script file associated.
Supported file types : js, jse, ps1, ps1xml, psc1, psd1, psm1, pssc, cdxml, vbs, vbe, wsf, wsc

WhenToCallInstallCompleteApiModel.description: A model class for how to install options.

UseAdditionalCriteria.description: Value indicating whether additional criteria has to be used or not.

IdentifyApplicationBy.description: The way by which an application can be identified (Supported Values: DefiningCriteria, UsingCustomScript).

CriteriaList.description: The criteria configured to identify application.

AppFilesOptionsModel.description: A model class for files options.

WhenToInstallApiModel.description: A model class for when to install options.

DiskSpaceRequiredInKb.description: The disk space required for installation of the package in KB.

DevicePowerRequired.description: The device power required for installation of the package. Valid range 0 - 100.

RamRequiredInMb.description: The RAM required for the installation of the page in MB.

HowToInstallApiModel.description: A model class for how to install options.

InstallContext.description: Install context (Supported values:  Device, User) where the package has to be installed.

InstallCommand.description: Gets or sets the install command to install a package using the command line ex: "/quiet".

AdminPrivileges.description: Value indicating whether admin privileges are needed for the installation of a package.

DeviceRestart.description: The device restart option. Supported values: DoNotRestart, ForceRestart, RestartIfNeeded

RetryCount.description: The number of times package installation operation will be retried.  Valid range 0 - 10

RetryIntervalInMinutes.description: The amount of time in minutes between retry operations.  Valid range 0 - 10

InstallTimeoutInMinutes.description: The amount of time in minutes that the installation process can run before the installer considers the installation may have failed.  Valid range 0 - 60

WhenToCallInstallComplete.description: When to call install complete options.

CommandLineArguments.description: Command-line options to be used when calling MSIEXEC.exe.

InstallTimeoutInMinutes.description:
Amount of time, in minutes that the installation process can run before the installer 
considers the installation may have failed and no longer monitors the installation operation.Range 0-60

RetryCount.description: The number of times the download and installation operation will be retried before the installation will be marked as failed. With a limit of 10' attempts.

ActualFileVersion.description: Gets or sets the Actual File Version of the App.

BuildVersion.description: Gets or sets the Build Version of the App.

AirwatchAppVersion.description: Gets or sets the AirWatch internal application version.

Status.description: Gets or sets the Status of the App

ManagedBy.description: Gets or sets Managed By Organization Group Id.

AssumeManagementOfUserInstalledApp.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether management of user installed apps should be assumed.

MinimumOperatingSystem.description: Gets or sets the Minimum Operating System Version of the Application.

AppSizeInKB.description: Gets or sets the size of the application.

CategoryList.description: Gets or sets the application category list.

Comments.description: Gets or sets the Comments for the Application.

ApplicationUrl.description: Gets or sets the url for the Application.

Sdk.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application uses AirWatch Software Development Kit.

SdkProfileId.description: Gets or sets the Sdk Profile Id of the App if it uses SDK Profile.

DevicesAssignedCount.description: Gets or sets the number of device to which current application is Assigned.

DevicesInstalledCount.description: Gets or sets the number of device on which current application is Installed.

DevicesNotInstalledCount.description: Gets or sets the number of device to which current application is Assigned, but not installed.

Rating.description: Gets or sets the User Rating of the App.

ChangeLog.description: Gets or sets the Change Log for the Application.

RenewalDate.description: Gets or sets the expiration date of the Device Provisioning Profile.

Assignments.description: Gets or sets the app configs.
